funnels.name: Awareness
funnels.description: Raise global awareness through visually stunning and thought-provoking creative that introduces the setting, themes, and scale of the narrative.
funnels.formats: Teaser trailers, reels, concept art, themed Instagram carousels, influencer reads, podcast features
funnels.optimisation: A/B test visuals (dinosaurs vs human drama), refine creative based on engagement rates

funnels.name: Consideration
funnels.description: Push narrative intrigue and ethical dilemmas; position the book as both thriller and conversation starter on genetic engineering.
funnels.formats: Behind-the-scenes author Q&A, science explainer videos, audiogram snippets, Amazon book page excerpts
funnels.optimisation: Track interaction depth across content strands; prioritise scientific intrigue for academically inclined audiences

funnels.name: Conversion
funnels.description: Prompt immediate purchase through urgency-led CTAs, social proof, and bonus content offers.
funnels.formats: Countdown graphics, discount codes, influencer launch-day reviews, newsletter samples
funnels.optimisation: Test CTA language (e.g., 'Buy Now' vs 'Discover the Consequences'); focus retargeting on warm leads
